text: Team Stars prevails in competitive debut for new All-Star Game - ESPN

text: Jerome Tang fired for cause after 1-11 start to Big 12 play - themercury.com

text: What author Michael Pollan thinks we should and shouldn't eat - CBS News

text: Hungary: Magyar launches anti-Orban election campaign - DW.com

text: Ilia Malinin Reportedly Set To Return To Olympic Stage In Final Weekend - HuffPost

text: He spent decades perfecting his voice. Now he says Google stole it. - The Washington Post

text: NBA's effort to stop tanking is 'not working,' Adam Silver says - NBC News

text: Jeffries goes all in on gerrymandering — with House control on the line - CNN
fullText: As Hakeem Jeffries sits in the minority of a GOP-controlled Washington, he is still haunted by a Republican gerrymandering gambit that he believes cost him the speaker’s gavel — and cost his party control of the House.
